div.div: Carnegie Mellon vs. Univ. of Chicago

tr.td: Chicago wins coin toss, defers. CMU to receive.
Kurzydlowski,M. kickoff 60 yards to the CMU5, William Richter return 19 yards to the CMU24 (Winebrake,Henry).
Sam Benger rush for 9 yards to the CMU33, out-of-bounds (Vincent,Jeremy).
PENALTY CMU false start 5 yards to the CMU28.
Alex Cline pass incomplete to Garrett Strobel.
Clock 14:25, Alex Cline pass incomplete to Garrett Strobel (Beytagh,Andrew).
Clock 14:21, Tyler Kohman punt 44 yards to the UC28, out-of-bounds.
